__TOC__

This page is for discussing which applications should be provided as packages for OU Ubuntu.

== Essential ==

Any applications not currently available in a default install of Ubuntu/Xubuntu/Kubuntu.
* Generic - not be course dependent
* Not user interface dependent

=== Communication ===

* FirstClass client
* FireFox browser

== WINE ==

Any application considered essential but not available as a native Linux application. Note this excludes packages for which an Ubuntu package is not available but another distribution is.
